title: BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop for Hard Floors and Area Rugs, Black, 2554A
descriptions:
**Product Listing:**

**BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop for Hard Floors and Area Rugs, Black, 2554A**

**Multi-Surface Cleaning Made Easy**

Experience the ultimate in cleaning convenience with the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max, a powerful and versatile all-in-one wet-dry vacuum cleaner and mop. This innovative device is designed to tackle hard floors and area rugs with ease, providing a thorough and efficient cleaning experience.

**Key Features:**

* **Cordless Freedom**: Enjoy up to 30 minutes of cordless cleaning with the 36V Lithium-Ion battery, giving you the freedom to clean anywhere, anytime.
* **Rotating Brush System**: The rotating brush system provides a thorough cleaning experience, picking up dirt, dust, and debris with ease.
* **10.5-Inch Cleaning Path**: The wide cleaning path allows you to cover more area in less time, making quick work of cleaning tasks.
* **Swivel Head and Carry Handle**: The swivel head and carry handle make it easy to maneuver and transport the CrossWave Cordless Max.
* **Two-Tank Technology**: The clean water tank holds 28 oz, while the dirt tank holds 18.6 oz, allowing you to clean for longer without needing to refill or empty.
* **Improved Edge Cleaning**: The CrossWave Cordless Max features improved edge cleaning, ensuring a thorough cleaning experience along baseboards and tight spaces.
* **Wi-Fi Connected and App Compatible**: Stay connected with the BISSELL Connect app, allowing you to track your cleaning progress and receive maintenance alerts.
* **Self-Cleaning Cycle**: The self-cleaning cycle ensures your CrossWave Cordless Max remains in top condition, cleaning the brush roll and tank with ease.
* **Multi-Surface Compatibility**: Suitable for use on tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, linoleum, rubber floor mats, pressed wood floors, and area rugs.

**Supporting a Good Cause**

BISSELL is proud to support the BISSELL Pet Foundation, a non-profit organization dedicated to reducing the number of pets in shelters and supporting pet adoption.

**What's Included:**

* 2 Multi-Surface Trial Formulas
* 2 Hard Floor Sanitize Trial Formulas
* 2 Multi-Surface Brush Rolls

**Order Your BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max Today!**

Experience the power and convenience of the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max, and take the first step towards a cleaner, healthier home. Order now and discover a smarter way to clean!

**Product Description:**

Get the ultimate cleaning experience with the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max, a powerful and versatile all-in-one wet-dry vacuum cleaner and mop. This innovative device is designed to tackle hard floors and area rugs with ease, providing a comprehensive cleaning solution for your home.

**Key Features:**

* **Cordless Convenience:** Enjoy up to 30 minutes of uninterrupted cleaning time with the 36V Lithium-Ion battery.
* **Multi-Surface Cleaning:** Easily transition between different floor types, including tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, linoleum, rubber floor mats, pressed wood floors, and area rugs.
* **Rotating Brush System:** Effectively pick up dirt, dust, and debris with the rotating brush system.
* **Improved Edge Cleaning:** Get into tight spaces and corners with the improved edge cleaning feature.
* **WiFi Connected:** Control and monitor your cleaning sessions with the BISSELL Connect app.

* **Swivel Head and Carry Handle:** Easily maneuver and transport the device with the swivel head and carry handle.

**Included Accessories:**

**Supporting a Good Cause:**
Purchase of this product supports the BISSELL Pet Foundation, a non-profit organization dedicated to helping pets in need.

**Technical Specifications:**

**Order now and experience the power of the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max!**

Take your cleaning game to the next level with the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max, a powerful and versatile all-in-one wet-dry vacuum cleaner and mop designed for hard floors and area rugs. This cordless wonder offers up to 30 minutes of continuous cleaning time, thanks to its 36V Lithium-Ion battery.

**Key Features:**

* Rotating brush system for effective cleaning
* 10.5-inch cleaning path width for efficient coverage
* Swivel head and carry handle for easy maneuverability
* Two-tank technology: 28 oz clean water tank and 18.6 oz dirt tank
* Improved edge cleaning for a thorough clean
* WiFi connected capabilities for seamless app integration with BISSELL Connect
* Self-cleaning cycle for easy maintenance
* Multi-surface cleaning capabilities for tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, linoleum, rubber floor mats, pressed wood floors, and area rugs

**What's Included:**

* 2 Multi-Surface Trial Formulas
* 2 Hard Floor Sanitize Trial Formulas
* 2 Multi-Surface Brush Rolls

**Supporting a Good Cause:**

BISSELL is proud to support the BISSELL Pet Foundation, a non-profit organization dedicated to reducing the number of pets in shelters and supporting pet adoption.

**Order now and experience the power and convenience of the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max!**
